name: Monkey's Bane Vine
description: The Monkey's Bane Vine is a large, robust plant creature that resembles an ordinary vine when motionless. Known for its strong grappling tendrils, this creature can control the battlefield.
memorable: Its ability to blend into the environment as a vine makes it a surprising threat.
goals: Ambush intruders and restrain them to deal damage over time.
relations: Typically encountered in dense foliage or areas where it can disguise itself as a mundane vine.
environment: Forests or jungles, often hidden among other vegetation.
strengths: High hit points, ability to restrain and continuously damage opponents.
weaknesses: Limited mobility with only 10 feet of movement.
attacks: Can strike with two tendrils from 20 feet away, dealing bludgeoning damage and grappling foes.
most_powerful_ability: False Appearance allows it to remain undetected until it attacks.
senses: Blindsight up to 30 feet helps it detect threats without moving.
skills: Possesses basic perception abilities, useful for detecting nearby targets.
additional_information: Resilient to cold and fire damage.
Immune to being blinded, deafened, exhausted, or prone.
Can only grapple one creature per tendril.
Distracting for those who venture too close.
test_queries: vine creature that resembles common vines
creature that blends into forest foliage
